title: CMP SLURRY COMPOSITION FOR POLISHING TUNGSTEN PATTERN WAFER AND METHOD OF POLISHING TUNGSTEN PATTERN WAFER USING THE SAME

samples.experiment_context: CMP slurry with colloidal silica modified by Formula 5 silane (aminoethylaminopropyltrimethoxysilane type) and Formula 7 biocide (1,2-dibromo-2,4-dicyanobutane).

abrasive_synthesis.description: Colloidal silica modified with an amino silane containing two nitrogen atoms.

modification.modifier_name: Amino silane with two N atoms (e.g., aminoethylaminopropyltrimethoxysilane)

slurry_preparation.description: Preparation of CMP slurry using modified silica.
